text: The Swedish National Institute of Economic Research (, KI or NIER) is a government agency in Sweden responsible for economic analysis and forecasting. The NIER is publicly funded, although it does accept a small number of private commissions. It employs over 60 people, primarily economists. ==External links== *National Institute of Economic Research - Official site Institute of Economic Research Category:Economy of Sweden Category:Economic research institutes Category:Public finance of Sweden Category:Forecasting organizations
title: National Institute of Economic Research (Sweden)
